# SnapDeck AI — Complete Information

> Turn photos and PDFs into flashcards instantly with on-device AI.

## About SnapDeck AI

SnapDeck AI is an iOS app that transforms study materials into flashcards using Apple Intelligence. Take a photo of your textbook, lecture notes, handout, or import a PDF — SnapDeck AI reads the content and generates a complete set of question-and-answer flashcards in seconds.

All AI processing happens entirely on your iPhone using Apple's on-device Foundation Models. No internet connection is required, no data is uploaded to any server, and no accounts are needed. Your study materials remain 100% private.

## Features

### Snap & Create
Take a photo of your textbook, lecture notes, or handout. SnapDeck AI reads the content and generates a complete flashcard deck in seconds.

### On-Device AI
Powered by Apple Intelligence, all processing happens right on your iPhone. No internet required, no cloud uploads, no waiting.

### 100% Private
Your study materials never leave your device. No accounts, no data collection, no tracking. Your notes stay completely private.

### Interactive Study
Flip through cards, mark what you know and what needs review. Track your progress and master any subject efficiently.

## How It Works

1. **Snap a photo** — Take a photo of your textbook, notes, or slides. You can also import PDFs or type text manually.
2. **AI generates cards** — Apple Intelligence reads your material and creates question-and-answer flashcards automatically.
3. **Study & master** — Flip through your cards, mark progress, and review until you've mastered the material.

## Pricing

- **Free**: Up to 3 decks per month
- **Premium**: Unlimited deck creation, unlimited document length, unlimited cards per deck, lifetime purchase available

## System Requirements

- iPhone 15 Pro or later
- iOS 26
- Apple Intelligence enabled

## Privacy

SnapDeck AI is built with privacy as a core principle:
- No account or registration required
- No photos, PDFs, or text content is uploaded to any server
- No analytics or tracking SDKs are embedded in the app
- No cookies or identifiers are stored
- All AI processing uses Apple's on-device Foundation Models
- Flashcard decks and study progress are stored locally using Apple's SwiftData framework
- No data is synced to any cloud service

## Developer

- Company: 12F ApS
- Website: https://12f.dk/
- Product page: https://snapdeck.12f.dk/
- Privacy policy: https://snapdeck.12f.dk/privacy-policy.html

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How does SnapDeck AI create flashcards?
Take a photo of your textbook, lecture notes, or handout — or import a PDF. SnapDeck AI uses Apple Intelligence to read the content and automatically generate question-and-answer flashcards in seconds, all on-device.

### Does SnapDeck AI require an internet connection?
No. All AI processing happens entirely on your iPhone using Apple Intelligence. No internet connection, cloud uploads, or external servers are involved.

### Is my data private with SnapDeck AI?
Yes. SnapDeck AI is 100% private. Your photos, PDFs, and study materials never leave your device. No accounts, no data collection, no tracking.

### What devices support SnapDeck AI?
SnapDeck AI requires iPhone 15 Pro or later running iOS 26 with Apple Intelligence enabled.

### Is SnapDeck AI free?
Yes, SnapDeck AI is free to use with up to 3 decks per month. A Premium upgrade is available for unlimited deck creation, unlimited document length, and unlimited cards per deck.
